buildCommand: npx esbuild api/cards/resolve.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --format=esm --outfile=api/cards/resolve.js && rm api/cards/resolve.ts && npx esbuild api/health.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --format=esm --outfile=api/health.js && rm api/health.ts && pnpm turbo build --filter=@mtg-companion/web
